studiedState._instruction: Add all states in which this subject group was studied.
studiedState.description: Reference to a point in time at which something or someone was studied in a particular mode or condition.
studiedState.title: studiedState

additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter additional remarks about the specimen set.
additionalRemarks.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
additionalRemarks.title: additionalRemarks

biologicalSex._instruction: Add the biological sex of all specimen in this set.
biologicalSex.description: Differentiation of individuals of most species (animals and plants) based on the type of gametes they produce.
biologicalSex.title: biologicalSex

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier of this specimen set that is used within the corresponding data.
internalIdentifier.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
internalIdentifier.title: internalIdentifier

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen set that may help you to more easily find it again.
lookupLabel.title: lookupLabel

phenotype._instruction: Add the phenotype of all specimen in this set.
phenotype.description: Physical expression of one or more genes of an organism.
phenotype.title: phenotype

quantity._instruction: Enter the number of specimen that belong to this set.
quantity.description: Total amount or number of things or beings.
quantity.title: quantity

species._instruction: Add the species of all specimen in this set.
species.description: Category of biological classification comprising related organisms or populations potentially capable of interbreeding, and being designated by a binomial that consists of the name of a genus followed by a Latin or latinized uncapitalized noun or adjective.
species.title: species

strain._instruction: Add the strain of all specimen in this set.
strain.description: Group of presumed common ancestry with physiological but usually not morphological distinctions.
strain.title: strain
